author: jimmygchen
content:
Another potential performance gain on high blob count - add SSZ support to `getBlobsV2` and `getPayloadV5`. Serialising & parsing ~16mb (64 blobs) of JSON during block production / proposal may take a bit of time, i dont have numbers tho and is different in different languages. Would like to hear thoughts if it's worth doing in Fusaka?
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/630/files#r2017920764
